subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
Your overdue payment of $15m which has been approved for immediate release to you.
kindly respond for next procedures.
Mr Zakky Ali

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Zakky Ali,

Thank you for your message. I'm glad to hear about the approval of the overdue payment. Could you please provide more details about this? For instance, what is this payment related to? And how was it approved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samantha

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Samantha

its your overdue inheritance fund as the next of in and sole beneficiary of
the fund and you are required to go to amsterdam holland to pick up the
fund by cash payment in person.

let me know if you are ready to proceed.

mr zakky ali

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello Mr. Zakky Ali,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this overdue fund. Could you please provide more details? How did this situation come about and why is the fund located in Amsterdam, Holland? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Samantha

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Samantha

you dont have to be surprised becasue you are the next of in and sole
benefiairy of this fund from Jessica Karen Saunders a former contractor to
federal govermment of Nigeria on crude oil supply and maintancenace befor
her death years back.

this fund was relocated to amsterdam holland so it can be easy for you to
pick up in person and by cash payment.

Mr Zakky Ali
